titleStmt.title: ODD - TEI customization for poetry genetic edition
titleStmt.author: Sarah Orsini

publicationStmt.p: To enable genetic edition of poetry

sourceDesc.p: Created on November 2017, inspired by "An Encoding Model for Genetic Editions" ODD

div.head: ODD
div.p: TEI Extension for Genetic Editions -- preliminary version
